T02D3115:214b-1: bha ga wa ti aushn'i shi bi dza ya sto tra /
T02D3115:214b-3: bcom ldan 'das ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la bstod pa /
T02D3115:214b-4: mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3115:214b-5: gtso mo bcom ldan 'das ma ni /
T02D3115:214b-6: punda r'i ka'i me tog ltar //
T02D3115:214b-7: skyon gyis ma gos sku mdog dkar //
T02D3115:214b-8: zhal gsum phyag brgyad spyan gsum mnga' //
T02D3115:214b-9: dbu rgyan mgul rgyan snyan char bcas //
T02D3115:214b-10: rin chen sna tshogs mdzes pas brgyan //
T02D3115:215a-2: dbus dkar g-yas ser g-yon zhal sdo //
T02D3115:215a-3: khro mo'i cha lugs mche ba gtsigs //
T02D3115:215a-4: phyag g-yas sna tshogs rdo rje dang //
T02D3115:215a-5: bad steng rgyal ba 'od dpag med //
T02D3115:215a-6: mda' dang mchog sbyin phyag rgya'o //
T02D3115:215a-7: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags ba dang ;
T02D3115:215a-8: / gzhu dang mi 'jigs phyag rgya dang //
T02D3115:215a-9: bum pa dag ni legs par bsnams //
T02D3115:215a-10: rnam par snang mdzad dbu brgyan cing //
T02D3115:215a-12: stod g-yogs lha yin bza' can //
T02D3115:215a-13: blo dang tshe 'phel mdzad ba mo //
T02D3115:215a-14: pu ri'i nang du mdzes par bzhugs //
T02D3115:215a-15: bcom ldan 'das ma nyid la bstod //
T02D3115:215a-16: g-yas na rje btsun spyan ras gzigs //
T02D3115:215a-17: sku mdog dkar po skyon ma gos //
T02D3115:215a-18: g-yon na bad bsnams g-yas pa na //
T02D3115:215a-20: g-yon gyi gsang ba'i bdag bo ni //
T02D3115:215a-22: g-yas pa rnga yab mdzes 'dzin pa //
T02D3115:215a-23: mthu stobs can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3115:215a-24: shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi yi //
T02D3115:215a-25: khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi po ni //
T02D3115:215a-26: mdun na khro rgyal mi g-yo ba //
T02D3115:215a-27: sngo bsangs g-yas na ral gri 'dzin //
T02D3115:215a-28: g-yon na sdigs mdzub skra brdzes pa //
T02D3115:215a-29: sbrul rgyan stag gi sham thabs can //
T02D3115:215a-30: padma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D3115:215a-32: khro chen 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni //
T02D3115:215a-33: sngo bsangs lcags kyu 'bar ba bsnams //
T02D3115:215a-34: ma rungs 'dul ba'i rgyan cha can //
T02D3115:215a-36: khro chen dbyug pa sngon bo ni //
T02D3115:215a-37: zhal gcig phyag gnyis g-yas pa na //
T02D3115:215a-38: dbyug to g-yon pa sdigs mdzub mdzad //
T02D3115:215a-39: sngo bsangs kun 'dul khyod la bstod //
T02D3115:215a-40: khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po che //
T02D3115:215a-42: g-yas pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub g-yon //
T02D3115:215a-43: bdud 'dul drag po khyod la bstod //
T02D3115:215a-44: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo //
T02D3115:215a-45: kun kyang stag dang sbrul gyis brgyan //
T02D3115:215a-46: padma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D3115:215a-47: bar chad zhi mdzad khyed la bstod //
T02D3115:215a-48: steng gi phyogs na mdzes pa yi //
T02D3115:215a-49: gnas gtsang lha yi bu gnyis po //
T02D3115:215a-50: lha yi bu ni gnyis po yang //
T02D3115:215b-0: lha @215b yi rgyan dang na bzas mdzes //
T02D3115:215b-1: phyag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams //
T02D3115:215b-2: bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs kun la snyoms //
T02D3115:215b-3: dag pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3115:215b-4: gang zhig nangs nangs sngar langs te //
T02D3115:215b-5: bstod pa 'di yis dus kun du //
T02D3115:215b-6: 'khor dang bcas la bstod gyur na //
T02D3115:215b-7: blo dang tshe rnams 'phel ba dang //
T02D3115:215b-8: dpal dang 'byor pa'i dngos grub ster //
T02D3115:215b-10: gus pa'i sems kyis sngar langs nas //
T02D3115:215b-11: rtse gcig sems kyis bstod par bya //
T02D3115:215b-12: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i bstod pa /
